definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Finland is also home to the world's longest-running rock festival, Ruisrock.
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭還是世界上持續時間最長的搖滾節的發源地。

sentences.english: Huanghe is the cradle of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 黃河是中國文化的發源地。

sentences.english: Setele: Korriban, ancient birth place of the Sith.
sentences.chinese: 柯瑞班，古老的西斯發源地。

sentences.english: New Orleans is the home of French cuisine in America.
sentences.chinese: 在美國，紐奧爾良是法國菜的發源地。

sentences.english: As the nuclear calcium storage pool, the nuclear envelope is the original site that generating nuclear calcium signals.
sentences.chinese: 作爲核鈣的貯存庫，核被是核鈣信號的發源地。

sentences.english: China is the origin and distribution center of rhododendrons.
sentences.chinese: 我國是杜鵑花的發源地和分佈中心。

sentences.english: Hanzhengjie is the birthplace of Hankou, it is also one of the culture cradle of Wuhan.
sentences.chinese: 漢正街是漢口的發源地，也是武漢市文化的搖籃之一。

sentences.english: Provence is the home of perfumery.
sentences.chinese: 普羅旺斯是香水業的發源地。

sentences.english: Archaeological discovery has shown that Beijing is a cradle of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 考古發掘表明，北京是中華民族的發源地之一。

sentences.english: China and India are both countries with ancient civilization.
sentences.chinese: 中國和印度同爲世界四大古文明的發源地。

sentences.english: Shanghai is Chinese piano industry headstream , history having close century so far already.
sentences.chinese: 上海是中國鋼琴工業的發源地，至今已有近百年曆史。

sentences.english: The source of the Yellow River can be traced to the Bayankela Mountains of Qinghai Province.
sentences.chinese: 黃河的發源地在青海的巴顏喀拉山上。

sentences.english: Suzhou is the birthplace of nut-carving.
Crete Island is the cradle of the ancient Aegean culture.
sentences.chinese: 克里特島是古代愛琴文化發源地。

sentences.english: Foshan is the "lion dance village", is the birthplace of the Southern Lion.
sentences.chinese: 佛山是“獅藝之鄉”，是南獅的發源地。

sentences.english: The resources of the Han nationality origin is the base of the tour for root_seeking.
sentences.chinese: 漢姓發源地資源是近年來開展尋根遊的主要依據。

definition: (military) strategic town/(fig.) major center (for commerce, culture or tourism etc)
holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
to give rise to (sth good)/to emanate from
